title: Help with this rounded A-apex and curved R-leg font
content:
Anyone to help me on the caps of this font used in the title of the book?

It has a hint of Houschka Pro, Base and Cifra (rounded A apex, curved leg R e.g.) but I doubt it is actually one of those (cfr. K, G).

Your suggestions please,  
and thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018114833im_/http:/typophile.com/files/968952_570733626311179_73258297_n_6612.jpg)
author: andyvanvoorden
